subject: Forget about paying for this
body:
Forget about paying for this...

As part of an insane marketing test, 

I am giving away an in-depth Internet "Business-In-A-Box". 

http://southturtle.com/t/qyrde.2lp/565382

I should be selling this for 497 Dollars, but...
I''m flat out giving it away. Your cost is zero... zip... zilch!

You probably think I''ve lost my mind - and maybe I have - 
but just visit this site right now and in 5 minutes 
you''ll have this awesome, 497 Dollar Internet Business, training kit
as my gift to you. No kidding!

Grab it quick - right now - before, I change my mind...

http://southturtle.com/t/qyrde.2lp/565382


Shawn
